Big Batch Cheeseburger Bake

Source:

Ingredients

  • 1.5 lb (at least 80%) ground beef
  • 1 1/4 cups chopped onions (about 2 large)
  • 1 can (10 3/4 oz) condensed Cheddar cheese soup
  • 1 1/4 cups Green Giant:tm: Valley Fresh Streamers™ frozen mixed vegetables
  • 1/2 cup milk
  • 2 1/3 cups Original Bisquick™ mix
  • 2/3 cup water
  • 1 1/3 cups shredded Cheddar chese (about 5oz)
